item.title: Uploading Files to AWS using SSH/SCP
item.description: Here is a small command for uploading files to AWS through SSH’s command scp (secure copy). scp -i path/to/your/key-pairs/file path/to/file/you/want/to/upload ubuntu@PUBLIC_DNS:path/to/the/destination
